name: Hallowed Mask
description:
Corruption has spread through the forest.
Dark entities lurk in the shadows. Use the mask to fend them off and reach the sacred lake.

Assets used in this project:

Free assets from the Unity Asset Store were used for the trees, rocks, and some decorative elements in the map. Sounds and music were downloaded from Freesound.org and Free Music Archive. We also used the plugin Panoply for Unity.

All other artistic assets and code are original, including illustrations, characters, and visual effects.
